Articles.Content: I have to use 2 different keys to enter and exit map view. That's...weird.
I press M to do both. What buttons do you have to press? Did you change any of the input settings?
I have an azerty keyboard, think that's the problem. I changed the config for toggle map view to where my m is. That works to enter map view. To exit, I have to use the qwerty m (I think)

To exit map, use the "M" key  as if it were a QWERTY keyboard (if you have an azerty keyboard, it's the key ",").

If you are foolish enough to have a BÉPO keyboard (like yours truly), it's the key "Q"

Edited February 24, 2023 by Baleine
